revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Spawn}} '''A_FiredRocks'''
(''no parameter'')
Spawns five actors of types {{Class|FireDemonRock1}}, {{Class|FireDemonRock2}}, {{Class|FireDemonRock3}}, {{Class|FireDemonRock4}}, or {{Class|FireDemonRock5}}. The rocks will be spawned at some location within 8 map units in all directions from the calling actor. On successful spawn, the x/y velocities of the rocks will be set to some value -2-2, and the z velocities will be set to some values 0-2. Additionally, their special1 value will be set to 2. Finally, the calling actor's special2 is set to 0 and the {{Flag|JUSTATTACKED}} flag is removed. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|FireDemon}} and derived classes.
